title: Night Classes
description: The School of Paranormal Advanced Studies in East Texas isn't a normal school, the students that go there are the things humans fear as nightmares. When Cody Sunktokeca left his pack in South Dakota to attend school, the monsters find out that there are worse things out there. Now the monsters are being stalked and only working together to save themselves.
author: Kris Owens-Norris
